channel.title: How to get a FREE PSP! With Pictures!
channel.description:
[size=20pt][u] How To Get Free PSP![/u][/size]
Introduction:
I have gotten a ton of messages from people asking me if my signature about getting free real PSPs is true, so I thought I would make a little TUT :)
This is a pretty simple TUT, just follow every single step and in no-time you will have a free PSP (Or PS2 or $250, whatever you want!) in your hands! Anyways...
Steps:
1. Open a new browser (If using IE) or open a new tab (if using FF).
2. In your new browser or tab copy & paste this in the address bar: http://www.freeplaystations.com/?ref=78LV11
3. Sign up with the site. [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/8181/signupnd8.png[/img]
Make sure you click on the item you want. [img]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/4954/freeitemsix0.png[/img]
4. After signing up go to Members Login. [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/9739/membersloginyh7.png[/img]
5. After you’re logged in, go to Offers. If you have already completed your offer it will say continue to referral page. [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/4706/offersko5.png[/img]
6. Now here’s the part where it gets tricky. Most of the offers you have to complete say there free, but there’s always a catch. The only offer you can do which would cost you practically nothing is Video Professor. [img]http://img123.imageshack.us/img123/7972/videoprofessordg3.png[/img]
If you want you can do some of the other offers but I haven’t tried half of them because at the end they ask for money Lol.
7. After you completed your offer (may take 1-3 days to register on the site) continue to the referral page. [img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/4362/referralpp1.png[/img]
Conclusion:
Now if you’re the decent and honest type like me then you would just post your referral link in your signature or something close. You must wait till 5 people go to your link, sign up and complete an offer. Or if you’re the cheating type, you would get 5 different proxies, click on your link 5 different times with those 5 different proxy and complete steps 1-6, simple. On the FreePlayStation.com site don’t forget to read the "How it works" and "Faq" sections.
If you have any feedback or questions don’t be shy to post it here :) Enjoy your new PSP :)
*Edit* I took out the [TUT] in my title ;)
*Edit2* Oh and everyone I got pictures of my PSP, take a look. Sorry I didn't post this earlier, but seeing as I dont have a camera or web cam-it wasn't possible for me. This is everything I got for free (I not only got a free PSP, I also got 2 games; Prince Of Persia and Lumines-It was a different offer then) back then.
[img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/6341/mypspthatigotfromfreeplaystationcomsuckersyv1.png[/img]
Heres a closer look:
[img]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/2756/mypspthatigotfromfreeplaystationcomsuckers2yi4.png[/img]
*Edit3* Oh and everyone please excuse Drunk On Java and his bamblings about this being fake, hes a proven liar. I assure you that this is real and that [b]I have already gotten my free PSP[/b].
[quote="Rictoo"][quote author=Drunk On Java link=topic=16492.msg187508#msg187508 date=1156658032] My hotmail account, I have had in 2 years and got literally 3.6 million unread messages. From tons of newbies here on the forum and ads etc. [/quote]
Funny thing that's CRAP.
If each email was 1kb (I'm being wayy fair here, they are each about 2-3kb), and multiply that by 3,600,000 that would equal around 3515mb
Hotmail only offers 250mb. zomghax[/quote]
Owned.

item.title: How to get a FREE PSP! With Pictures!
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

[quote=“PainAngel, post:89, topic:11113”][quote author=Drunk On Java link=topic=16492.msg186898#msg186898 date=1156642970]
I have been to it before. Tons of ads, this is probably a hoax. I mean you have to have 5 people do it before you get it? F that.
[/quote]

First of all, if you actually have freinds, just simply tell them to do the same FREE offer you did over msn/aim.
second, it’ll only work in the US, cos it when trying to sign up for that video professer, even though it actually says ‘zip/POSTAL CODE’ it doesnt let you write a postal code as it’s to the US only.
would probably work if i were american
good guide.

PS you gotta pay for postage ;[/quote]

Maybe they already did it for my PSP?

Anyways I can’t believe this thread is still up. Well it doesn’t matter because I already got my PS2. I don’t care what people have to say because the purpose of this thread was fulfilled.

And Avistetto, I know the rules, I have been here much longer then you. It doesn’t matter if I post a referral link or not, it takes you to the same page. But if your going to be like that then so be it.

If I see anymore spam/flame about this topic then I will close it. Theres no reason why a couple of poor kids who can’t afford shipping should wreck this for the kids who can. Would you rather pay $200 for it at your local Walmart, or $10 for just the shipping.

So again, anymore spamming/flaming and this thread will be closed.

Oh and Thank you to all the people who signed up and got me my free PS2

Read full topic
